name: UP906980 - Hard Mode Asteroids
description:
You can only shoot when you are completely still, Good Luck.

Oh, there's also no sounds since I couldn't get the sound to work.

The tutorial I used to make the is the Asteroids tutorial by Shaun Spalding on YouTube.

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLPRT_JORnIuo-DyoWbB7LBrhqlJnsltJq
